data_maturity_score.evidence: Basic workflow managers (Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect) mentioned but no modern data stack tools like dbt, no CI/CD practices, or quality monitoring mentioned. Focus on traditional data pipelines suggests developing maturity.

data_maturity_level.evidence: Score of 2 indicates developing stage with basic automation but lacking modern practices and governance

maturity_signals.evidence: Multiple workflow managers mentioned (Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect) indicating some automation practices

scope_creep_score.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role focused on data modeling and platform work. No indication of multi-role responsibilities or scope expansion.

overtime_risk_score.evidence: No work-life balance signals mentioned, 3-month probation period suggests high expectations, but no explicit overtime or startup pace language.

role_clarity.evidence: Focused data engineering role with specific responsibilities for data platform team, data modeling, and pipeline development clearly outlined

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Moderate risk due to location restrictions and lack of work-life balance signals, but well-defined role and no scope creep

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: No reporting structure, manager level, or team hierarchy mentioned in job posting

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure mentioned in job posting

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: No learning budget, conference attendance, mentorship programs, or career advancement opportunities mentioned

hiring_urgency.evidence: No hiring timeline, urgency, or start date requirements mentioned

competition_level.evidence: No application counts, competition level, or hiring difficulty mentioned

hiring_velocity.evidence: No hiring velocity, expansion plans, or team growth mentioned

team_size_signals.evidence: Only mentions data platform team but no specific team size or composition details

strengths: Focused data engineering role with clear modeling responsibilities
Established Korean company (MUSINSA) with global fashion platform presence
Core data platform team with defined mission and responsibilities
concerns: Korean residency requirement limits international candidates
No compensation, benefits, or work-life balance information disclosed
Limited growth opportunities and learning support mentioned
3-month probation period suggests high performance expectations
best_fit_for: Korean data engineers with 3-6 years experience seeking data modeling focus
Candidates comfortable with traditional data engineering stack (SQL, Python, workflow managers)
Engineers willing to work in Seoul office with Korean residency
red_flags_to_probe: Ask about compensation, benefits, and work-life balance policies
Understand team structure, reporting, and growth opportunities
Clarify probation period expectations and performance metrics
negotiation_leverage: Strong SQL and Python skills are core requirements
Workflow manager experience (Airflow, etc.) is essential
Data modeling expertise is specifically highlighted in title
summary.overall_assessment: Traditional data engineering role at established Korean fashion company. Well-defined responsibilities but limited information about compensation, growth, and work culture. Main barriers are Korean residency requirement and lack of modern tech stack indicators.
